events.name: Azure and SGDotNET User Group Meeting @ 26th Feb 2015 7:00pm
events.description: The UG leads of both Azure and Sgdotnet have gotten together to see if we can basically consolidate our events together, as our basic target audience are predominantly overlapping. For a start, we’re organizing UG events with speakers from both sides of the technology! Date: 26th FEB 2015 Venue: Level 22, Meeting Room, Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard Time: Generally starts at 7pm sharp. 1.Programming Windows on IoT Devices by Neng Giin Yap 2. Azure Mobile Services with Cross-Platform Mobile Development by Punit Ganshani (MVP) The topic will cover basics of Azure Mobile Services and the architecture. As a demo, we will also cover how to create Mobile services on the Azure, consume the service from the Mobile devices using Windows Phone or Android using Xamarin or PhoneGap. Please RSVP to confirm your registration and attendance by 25 Feb. 2015. ( http://azureugfeb2015.eventbrite.sg ) Note that there’s currently no email confirmation for the event. 10 Lucky winner will receive 2 full day pass to attend System Center Universe APAC Conference (Over 25 sessions). System Center Universe APAC Only 2 weeks for SCU APAC in Singapore, do you need free ticket…? if yes…. Follow the steps Step 1 like us https://www.facebook.com/systemcenteruniverse.apac Step 2 Join us http://azureugfeb2015.eventbrite.sg Step 3 Tell me 2 reasons to attend System Center Universe APAC? Winner will be announce on 26th Feb 2015 @ Microsoft Azure UG meeting
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room

events.name: Python Meetup - February 2015
events.description: Our Python meetup returns for 2015~ Our friends from PayPal have graciously offered to host our meetup for February as well as pizzas and drinks! Speakers: 1. Martijn Faassen - MorePath and React 2. Kokhong - virtualenv in the enterprise environment Venue and Address: 1 Temasek Avenue, Millenia Tower, #14-01 Nearest MRT: Promenade (Yellow / Circle Line)

events.name: February meetup
events.description: Hi Everyone, let's have another meetup in one of the places we love and support :-) We haven't had any in Sarnie's yet, it's about time to fix that. See you all on 26th! Tomas Update! In combination via video streaming with the Bitcoin Tokyo, and the Hong Kong meetup groups, we'll be buying each others beer with bitcoin internationally!

events.name: First Meteor Meetup of 2015
events.description: Hello everyone, We are group of people who think MeteorJS is awesome. We are planning our first Meetup of 2015. ==================================== Meetup Agenda: #1 Testing with Meteor (Shawn Lim) #2 Bulletproof Meteor and Hackathon experience (Xu MengXiang) #3 Open talks for any other Meteor projects #4 Socializing / Networking ==================================== We have some time for anyone to share about any Meteor projects they are working on or would like to talk about. We have a projector at the venue so please just bring a laptop if you would like to do this. Organizers: Tze Ken Lee , Cofounder & Director at InnoMonster Pte. Ltd. 5 years of experience in web development. Max Li Bin , Front-end Developer, 5 years of experience in web development. Ahmed Muzammil Jamal , Senior Software Engineer, BPM Consultant @ Bank Julius Baer, Experienced web designer & developer. Rick Behl, Old school programmer, hacker and entrepreneur
